an3.129:1.1: Atha kho ayasma anuruddho yena bhagava tenupasankami; upasankamitva bhagavantam abhivadetva ekamantam nisidi. Ekamantam nisinno kho ayasma anuruddho bhagavantam etadavoca:
an3.129:1.2: “idhaham, bhante, dibbena cakkhuna visuddhena atikkantamanusakena yebhuyyena passami matugamam kayassa bheda param marana apayam duggatim vinipatam nirayam upapajjamanam.
an3.129:1.3: Katihi nu kho, bhante, dhammehi samannagato matugamo kayassa bheda param marana apayam duggatim vinipatam nirayam upapajjati”ti?
an3.129:2.1: “Tihi kho, anuruddha, dhammehi samannagato matugamo kayassa bheda param marana apayam duggatim vinipatam nirayam upapajjati.
an3.129:2.3: Idha, anuruddha, matugamo pubbanhasamayam maccheramalapariyutthitena cetasa agaram ajjhavasati, majjhanhikasamayam issapariyutthitena cetasa agaram ajjhavasati, sayanhasamayam kamaragapariyutthitena cetasa agaram ajjhavasati.
an3.129:2.4: Imehi kho, anuruddha, tihi dhammehi samannagato matugamo kayassa bheda param marana apayam duggatim vinipatam nirayam upapajjati”ti.
